tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE student_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  course_id INT,
  instructor_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT
);
CREATE TABLE students (student_id INT PRIMARY KEY, student_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, course_id INT NOT NULL, feedback TEXT);
CREATE TABLE instructors (instructor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, instructor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, course_id INT NOT NULL, evaluation TEXT);

CREATE TABLE student_feedback (
  student_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  course_id UUID,
  instructor_id UUID,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE course_evaluation (
  evaluation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  course_id UUID,
  evaluation_date DATE,
  overall_rating INT,
  content_rating INT,
  instructor_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
	feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	student_id INT,
	course_id INT,
	instructor_id INT,
	feedback_text TEXT,
	feedback_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES courses(course_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (instructor_id) REFERENCES instructors(instructor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE evaluations (
	evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	course_id INT,
	evaluation_score INT CHECK (evaluation_score >= 0 AND evaluation_score <= 10),
	evaluation_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES courses(course_id)
);
